results.content:
This is worst course ever  I purchased on Udemy.

1] Tutor  claims to teach Codeigniter but did not cover the 10% of its features. What he teach is just a CRUD.

2] On youtube there are much better tutorial than this and with more knowledge and free of cost

3] Tutor claims It is ERP software but its just 10%  of erp where is rest. 

4] Tutor is not Programmer as he teach same thing 10 times instead he should teach common methods for doing repetitive code.

5] This course is waste of time

6] Udemy should check the content before uploading this is UDEMY's mistake not tutor so this rating is for Udemy too.
